coding_practice.title: Relative Ranks
coding_practice.description:
You are given an integer array score of size n, where score[i] is the score of the i_th athlete in a competition. All the scores are guaranteed to be unique.

The athletes are placed based on their scores, where the 1st place athlete has the highest score, the 2nd place athlete has the 2nd highest score, and so on. The placement of each athlete determines their rank:

The 1st place athlete's rank is "Gold Medal".
The 2nd place athlete's rank is "Silver Medal".
The 3rd place athlete's rank is "Bronze Medal".
For the 4th place to the n_th place athlete, their rank is their placement number (i.e., the x_th place athlete's rank is "x").
Return an array answer of size n where answer[i] is the rank of the i_th athlete.
coding_practice.constraints:
n == score.length
1 <= n <= 10^4
0 <= score[i] <= 10^6
All the values in score are unique.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 將 score 陣列從大到小排序，得到排名順序。
2. 建立 rank_map 字典，將前三名對應到 "Gold Medal"、"Silver Medal"、"Bronze Medal"，其餘名次對應數字字符串。
3. 遍歷原始 score 陣列，依照 rank_map 返回每個運動員的名次。
